pageContext.claim: “The ballots will be stolen. Who knows where they're going? Who knows where they're coming from? …  It's going to be fraud all over the place. Who's getting the ballots? Who's sending the ballots? They have people saying you don't need a verified signature. This is a serious threat to our democracy, and the Democrats know that.”
pageContext.analysis: This is totally false. No election officials, Democrat or Republican, were trying to end signature verification measures for mail ballots. In fact, more states had adopted signature verification and other safety measures for the 2020 election.
